oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Optimierung der Anbautechnik von Zierpflanzen und Topfkräutern
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ornamentals, flower bulbs and tree nurseries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Project aims: - Finding solutions for bottlenecks in organic ornamental and potted herbs growing. Target group: - Ornamental growers Methodology: - Interviews with growers, on-farm and greenhouse experiments were carried out. Results: - Knowledge about peatless potting earth and transplant production are gained.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} Optimierung der Anbautechnik von Zierpflanzen und Topfkräutern. [Optimization of production systems of ornamental plants and potted herbs.] Runs 2002 - 2005. Project Leader(s): Koller, Martin, Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL), CH-5070 Frick.
